content.question: Which of the following describes an interpretation of Clayâ€™s economic principles at the time as expressed in the excerpt?

choices.label: The sections of the United States should retain separate regional economies.
The farmers of the United States should switch to manufacturing jobs.
The United States should increase domestic manufacturing to promote prosperity.
The United States should never engage in foreign commerce.

content.answer: The United States should increase domestic manufacturing to promote prosperity.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
